name: Arco Studio
tagline: The craft of espresso, made tangible.
hero_image_alt: Arco Studio E61 espresso machine with exposed brass group head and walnut side panels, positioned on a dark stone countertop, dual pressure gauges visible, a rich espresso flowing into a hand-thrown ceramic cup, warm ambient lighting emphasising the chrome and wood textures
headline: Where tradition meets intention.
subheadline: An E61 heat-exchange machine with a brass group, hand-finished walnut panels, and the kind of build quality that reveals itself over decades of daily use.
description_short: An E61 heat-exchange espresso machine with brass group head and walnut accents, built for the dedicated home barista.
description_long: The Arco Studio honours the E61 group head — the most proven design in espresso — by pairing it with a modern heat-exchange boiler and meticulous material choices. The brass group provides exceptional thermal stability and a pre-infusion phase that naturally smooths extraction. Walnut side panels and chrome detailing give the Studio a presence that belongs in a kitchen as much as a workshop. The dual pressure gauges let you read boiler and brew pressure at a glance, making every shot a conversation between you and the machine.
whats_in_box: Single and double VST precision baskets
use_case_headline: Perfect for the barista who treats espresso as a craft.
use_case_body: The Studio is for people who enjoy the ritual — warming the group, flushing before a shot, listening to the pump. If the process matters as much as the cup, this is the machine that rewards your attention.

pairing_products.rationale: A zero-retention single-dose grinder matches the Studio's precision and craft-oriented workflow.
An excellent stepless grinder at a more accessible price that still does justice to the Studio's capabilities.
A distribution tool and precision basket will help you extract the most from the E61 group.
